A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1 star for the excellent cinematography\, half a star for the score. Everything else in this movie flittered between boring and annoying. It's quite obvious that those now responsible for the franchises direction and writing\, have no real love for the universe and the elements which  made SW the most loved dynasty in cinematic history. Kathleen Kennedy has shown through both her hiring practices and publicly outlined priorities\, that she has no connection with the fans that turned SW into a juggernaut.
